description_html:
Described as a perfect lobby rug by many design firms, Drift - Light Blue strikes a perfect balance between making a strong first impression and complementing the interior it sits within. Scale is the key – the larger the rug, the more it becomes an abstract sea of sand surrounded by blue shores.

As one of the happy owners puts it: "Drift Light Blue combines oceanfront warmth with an oceanic coolness, flowing seamlessly together."

Hand-knotted with hand-carded and hand-spun wool at 200 knots per square inch to custom size.
